publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1447 Brian Adam: NHS in Grampian-That the Parliament expresses its concern that almost half of all patients in Scotland on waiting lists beyond the guaranteed maximum time are from Grampian; regrets that the proportion of patients in Grampian awaiting referrals from GPs for more than nine weeks and 18 weeks is the highest in Scotland; notes that the workload per employee in Grampian is higher that the Scottish average, and calls for an urgent investigation into the failure of the Arbuthnott formula to address these measures of need and demand in the NHS in Grampian.
S1M-1447 NHS in Grampian (lodged on 8 December 2000) Fergus Ewing*, Shona Robison*
S1M-1447 NHS in Grampian (lodged on 8 December 2000) Nora Radcliffe*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-1447 NHS in Grampian (lodged on 8 December 2000) Colin Campbell*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1447 NHS in Grampian (lodged on 8 December 2000) Irene McGugan*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*

S1M-1447 Brian Adam: NHS in Grampian-That the Parliament expresses its concern that almost half of all patients in Scotland on waiting lists beyond the guaranteed maximum time are from Grampian; regrets that the proportion of patients in Grampian awaiting referrals from GPs for more than nine weeks and 18 weeks is the highest in Scotland; notes that the workload per employee in Grampian is higher that the Scottish average, and calls for an urgent investigation into the failure of the Arbuthnott formula to address these measures of need and demand in the NHS in Grampian. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Shona Robison, Nora Radcliffe, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Christine Grahame, Mr Adam Ingram, Colin Campbell, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Irene McGugan, Mr Duncan Hamilton
S1M-1447 NHS in Grampian (lodged on 8 December 2000) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-1447 NHS in Grampian (lodged on 8 December 2000) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1447 NHS in Grampian (lodged on 8 December 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*

S1M-1447 NHS in Grampian (lodged on 8 December 2000) Andrew Wilson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Michael Matheson*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-1447 NHS in Grampian (lodged on 8 December 2000) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
